title: LEAVER BUSTER OWES ME 100 MINUTES
body: MY GAME CLIENT CRASHED DURING LOADING SCREEN AND WHEN I TRY TO RECONNECT, LEAVER BUSTER GIVES ME FIVE 20 MINUTE WAIT TIMERS!?!?!?!?!??!?!?!?!?!?!!??!?!?!  WHATTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!? WHAT IS THE MEANING OF THIS!?? I DEMAND ANSWERS!!!!!{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body: This happened to me 3 times today, I reinstalled windows 10 and the only way to stop crashes was setting compatibility to windows 7, now to get started on 15*20 minutes of waiting {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

If your game crashed and you weren't able to reconnect, it's pretty likely your team voted to remake the game since they didn't have a 5th member without you there. Since they decided to remake, this counts as an AFK for you, which prompted the LPQ. The only way you would have ended up with 5 games of 20min waits is if the account has a history of AFKs.
6 years of history lol.. i do want to thank the supporters of the community out there though{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
